nodes.text: Darrus Jeht was an individual of the Jedi Order who served as a Jedi General during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During the conflict, Jeht was the commanding officer of the lead starship of the Maelstrom-class battle cruiser, the Maelstrom. Despite most ships not participating in any combat during the war, the Maelstrom under the command of Jeht served with distinction at the Battle of Kromus and at the Battle of Cularin.
